title: And the award for Best Colophon of the Year Goes to...Roz Chaste!!!
content:
[The Party After You Left : Collected Cartoons](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014050119/http:/www.amazon.com/gp/product/1582343772/qid=1135617775/sr=1-1/ref=sr_1_1/103-8606841-4339843?s=books&v=glance&n=283155) by Roz Chast

I really enjoyed this book (given to me by my daughter) and thought others might like the humor of Roz Chaste as well. The colophon is an absolute scream for me at least :-)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014050119im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Roz%20ChastSm.jpg)

Well Roz, you are in good company. I spelled your name wrong just as badly as I spelled Stephen Coles name! Doohh!

ChrisL
Used to read Sciences magazine and always looked forward to his work.

Roz is a [her](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014050119/http:/www.acidlogic.com/im_rozchast.htm), not a him.

One of my favorite cartoonists, and one of the reasons I subscribe to the New Yorker.
